comment: I’m part of the team behind Astra, so this isn’t a neutral review. We built Astra to replace several separate bots with one free, all‑in‑one solution for moderation, levels, music and utilities. It’s still a work in progress and not perfect, but we actively maintain it, listen to feedback and try to improve it based on how real servers use it.

Astra is genuinely one of the cleanest and most reliable Discord bots I’ve used. The dashboard is smooth, fast, and super intuitive. Features feel polished, nothing buggy or overcomplicated. If you want a bot that actually makes your server easier to manage, this one’s worth it.

Hii, I really like this bot. 
Astra is cute and her design is flawless. But I would recommend a feature to create a voice channel plus interface, then I would install this bot in my server as well. 

Thank youu !
